data.name: Andrés Valencia A.
data.Profile: I have been a Visual Designer for almost 20 years now. I have experience in a wide range of design fields but my main interest has always been for web design, UX & UI. I have been very passionate about it, and now I have the chance to exploit that passion as a Frontend Developer in formation cause i have been selected in the Platzi Master program.

certificate.description: Hack up furballs try to jump onto window and fall while scratching at wall.
certificate.name: FrontEnd Developer

certificate.description: Scratch at the door then walk away wack the mini furry mouse
certificate.name: Backend Developer

Academic.description: The Visual Design career at the University of Caldas seeks to train professionals who are capable of diagnosing and solving visual communication problems through projection and creation. This is built from different aspects of design such as form, functionality, perception and interactivity, in conjunction with the application of image concepts and technologies, and in response to the needs of the environment.

As a Front End Developer, I can implement visual elements that are visible from the computer users vantage point within a web application. I combine the art of design with the science of programming. I am also responsible for the translation of UI/UX design wireframes to actual code.

experience.jobDescription: Created support images and pieces and some html code for the University portal.
I designed & coded HTML courses. I also made some layout for printed material.
I made the layout of pieces for social media, some prints and some html code too.
I designed & coded full websites mainly. I also made editing and post-production of video.
I design, code and make maintenance sites, that implies full html and css code and some Javascript for UX mainly. I also work on another areas of design.
